website_summaries.verdict: For the price point, the Porter-Cable multi-tool doesn’t deliver at the level many DIYers expect. Too-frequent blade changes and reports of a short lifespan hint at quality issues that don’t justify its price point.
pros: Depth and cutting guide included with kit
Universal fit means blades from other manufacturers usually can be used with this multi-tool
Corded unit provides reliable power during use
cons: Not as powerful as some others, but offers better precision and less vibration – good for detail cutting
Sanding pads don’t last long even with moderate use
Numerous complaints that blade attachments don’t last long
Multiple reports of tool quitting after just a few minutes of use

customer_reviews.title: How did I get the small tricky jobs, cuts, sandings, done without this tool!???
customer_reviews.text: How did I get my jobs done without this tool? I've used it 4 or 5 times in the short time I've had it since Christmas. Wow! What a time saver. Does everything it's supposed to quick, easy and perfectly. The learning curve is non-existent after learning how to put each attachment onto the tool head. And it's well balanced and really efficient. Plus after dealing with bigger clumsier tools like large pad, disc, or belt sanders this tool ROCKS! And cutting trim couldn't be easier unless someone else was doing it! I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: bigeasy

customer_reviews.title: Best $100 I've spent in a very long time
customer_reviews.text: Best $100 I've spent in a very long time. This is one of those tools that you immediately know is well worth it. It allows me to make cuts in close quarters that were previously not possible. The metal parts close to the head get hot when used for a while, but I guess this is normal with any tool with exposed metal. You'll quickly learn where NOT to hold it. And this kit with all the extra bits is far cheaper than what you'd pay for a comparable kit in your local big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oscillating Sanding Pad attachment melts where velcro sandpaper attaches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to sand in some tight spots on some furniture I'm refinishing. The oscillating sanding pad used with the triangle shaped sandpaper is poorly made and melted on the edges within two minutes of beginning to sand. Rest of tools seem to be okay, but haven't tried them yet. I'd recommend looking at other products though if you're needing to do some sanding. Hopefully if Porter Cable reads enough complaints about these, maybe they'll put out a better sanding attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and comes with lots of blades. I bought this as a lightning deal for $99 because it came with so many blades. I already had a cheap oscillating tool from Harbor Freight just needed more blades. This is much higher quality and the quick release for blade changing is great. Also has an adjustable depth stop which is nice. The only minor drawback would be those with arthritic hands might have a little trouble squeezing the blade release lever. If you are in the market for one of the oscillating tools this is a good bargain even at full price because of all the blades that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: House Doctor Ray

customer_reviews.title: Does everything that your other tools can’t.
customer_reviews.text: Great multipurpose tool. I own most tools, but this one can only do certain tasks that the other thousand can’t. I put off buying one of these for may years, I ran into an issue with a tight cut that had to be clean, this worked perfect with a fine tooth blade. I even tried the scraper blade, never thinking it would actually work, but wow did it.....on an old liquid nail type mastic on wood. The tool gets hot, but doesn’t appears to affect its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great tool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my son’s Porter Cable multi-tool on a kitchen remodel and absolutely had to have my own. This multi-tool is so easy to use, not too heavy for a 59 year old grandmother, and cuts through Sheetrock like a hot knife through butter! This set includes multiple blades to cut through wood, metal, plastic, etc. it can also fit in some pretty tight spaces. Everyone needs a Porter Cable multi-tool for projects around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality tool with all the attachments
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when ordering that you order the complete kit. It is worth the extra expense. Used mine on Pergo job for house. That made me a smart tool purchaser but dumb otherwise. I find I order tools more and more on line as I can comparison shop. Local hardware stores may have the tool you are looking for with a 'slightly' different number. That can translate into you not receiving all the accessories even though it appears to be the same item.
customer_reviews.author: rv8tor

customer_reviews.title: If you've been wanting one, buy it now
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an oscillating tool for over a year. Now I wish I hadn't waited so long to get one. The Porter Cable oscillating tool is powerful enough and easy to use. I especially like the tool-free blade change which allows you to switch blades easily without hauling out an allen wrench. The tool fits nicely in my hand and comes in a carrying case. I wish they had a better organizer for all the attachments, but you can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and reliable, best value
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and built with ruggedness in mind. The body has a rubberized coating which gives the tool a solid and firm feel with little vibration, unlike other brands. The variable speed is controlled by a detent wheel-type adjustment which stays wherever you select - the tool in operation does not cause the setting to change. Price for the kit which included a case and over 50 blades, sanding sheets, etc. was $99 in November, 2016.
customer_reviews.author: JK Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value. This has become one of my favorite tools!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tool! I have never owned an oscillating tool before, and I really only bought this because it was such a great price on Amazon's deal of the day. You'll be surprised at how handy and useful this tool is when performing large or small scale upgrade around your home. I use this tool for so many different projects. The product is really well made and works great!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyS

customer_reviews.title: great value and it is my second such unit (after ...
customer_reviews.text: great value and it is my second such unit (after a cheapo Chicago Electric) but still not sure how useful those tools really are...I mean for small jobs - yes.... but I'd rather get a few dedicated tools and spend more $$ to get the job done much quicker and easier. Might seem unfair to compare this tool to a good $150 jigsaw or palm sander but also just want to manage expectations..... I still wonder how the Fein tool compares.... but I am not spending $300 on multi tool if I already have many dedicated tools. Again...this is really good value as I bought it while on sale for $50 and it comes handy for small, quick tasks.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: So ordered it and have been really pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely impressed with this tool. Had looked at models that cost more but this was the recommendation by more folks on Amazon than any other. So ordered it and have been really pleased with it. I do some general handyman work and hobby woodworking. Have used the metal cutting blades to cut through nails when salvaging wood and the sanding pads are definitely fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R Cook

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: How did I work on stuff without this thing!!???!? I cut copper, sheet-rock, PVC, remove tile, tree stumps! Man, you name it I use this thing for it! The carrying case is nice for storage! I honestly cannot think of one complaint.
customer_reviews.author: summertime

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as a sander very well , which is what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: We hoped this tool would allow sanding in tight spaces, but unfortunately, the sanding pad holding the velcro sandpaper started to melt after light use and it needed to be returned. Until Porter Cable becomes more responsive to this problem, there are much better options out there for a compact sander, and at better prices.
customer_reviews.author: A J Berke

customer_reviews.title: Only have used the cutting feature, but works nice on soft wood/drywall
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the cutting blades on this, it cuts nicely thru drywall. I have tried cutting thru hard wood as well, next time I will use something else when cutting thru hard wood (it takes a long time). It comes with a nice long cord, easy to swap the blades in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool, much better than my battery-powered multi-tool.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool and a bargain at the sale price I paid. I've used a lower-cost battery-powered oscillating multi-tool for several years, and the difference is remarkable. This P-C tool is much quieter and much smoother. Really glad I bought it, would buy again and highly recommend to others. (I'll still use the battery-powered tool, you can't beat battery-powered for portability and ease-of-use when doing a small job.) Minor note: the "52 Accessories" is slightly misleading, IMHO -- 35 of the 52 are pieces of sandpaper, which aren't really accessories in my book, they're consumable supplies that have to be replaced as they wear out. A minor quibble, still an excellent value at the sale price.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco Kid

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my oscillating multi tool! It quickly became my favorite power tool after using it on a variety of projects. I haven't used other models of mult-tools, but the Porter Cable one has served me well, cutting through wood, laminate, and metal mostly thus far. The blades do wear out pretty fast, but I like the tool so much I don't mind. At the time of purchase, the Porter Cable model was the only one I saw that came with a depth guide, which I thought was super useful, but I actually haven't really used it. I still like that I have it, but the tool is very easy to use without the guide.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne N.

customer_reviews.title: Feels awesome, has a ton of tools and I've found ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels awesome, has a ton of tools and I've found more uses for it than I thought I would. The cable included is a nice feel and is plenty long if you're nearby an outlet. Only suggestion I would have is maybe a sticker inside the case showing what each attachment is used for since there isn't anywhere in any of the material that reminds you what each one is for, and only some of them say what they are for on the actual attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Ben J

customer_reviews.title: One big plus
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have around when you need it. Greatest feature is that if fits any other manufacturers blades (including Harbor Freights which are very low in price) and with a push of a button blades goes on effortlessly with no other tools. My carpenter friend is jealous because he purchased another very high quality name brand tool that he has to use a tool to place his brand-specific, expensive blades on with.
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made. I wasn't able to use this for what I originally wanted, because it entailed too much cutting of plywood in tight spaces, but it has come in very handy for other sanding and cutting jobs I wasn't even thinking of. My first multi-tool, so not exactly sure what to expect, and how it compares, which is why I didn't give it 5 stars. My fault, not the tool's. Exceptional for cutting flush up against things.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for sanding projects!! Photo- left door is prior to sanding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GLAD I BOUGHT IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it and found it to be one of the best tools I ever bought. You really can do things with this that was downright difficult to do before with hand tools. It's great for cut-outs where you need to plunge cut without destroying the inner or outer borders of the piece you're cutting. I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Makita fan boy, but I'll make an exception here.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow I love this tool. How did they do it in the old days when they were installing wider casing and had to cut back the old baseboard? I don't know. I don't want to know. All I know is I use this bad boy, and I love it. Cuts like butter. Toolless blade change is great. Only downside is the blades. They are awesome when they are new but wear out relatively quickly. Only genuine Porter Cable blades work, and they are pricey. I haven't compared to other brands. I haven't felt the need to: the price was good with the porter cable, and it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: lifeguardpat

customer_reviews.title: Very very happy..
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor of almost 30 years , and cannot believe I've never owned one of these. You can do practically everything with one of these. The build quality is solid and very well made. Many accessories included as well as a case. You can also purchase universal accessories that fit this tool. The quick release attachment really sets the porter cable apart from the other brands, enabling you to change the accessory in the fly within seconds. Very very happy.....great price.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, used it many times, ...but use hearing protection!
customer_reviews.text: This tool works excellent! No matter which attachment I have used, it kicks a**! However, the blade and motor noise at higher rpms is deafening. Strongly recommend you use good hearing protection.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Crunch

customer_reviews.title: Best handy tool out there but not to replace the traditional tools
customer_reviews.text: I got this on the recommendation of a family friend who does handy work for a living - and I am glad I listened, I cannot think of to many home projects where this tool doesn't end up coming in handy - cutting dry wall , 2 x 4's etc - its powerful, and does the work with ease - Ill be buying one for my father for Christmas - that being said, this tool is a handy addition to the tool box - you will still need traditional cutting saws for large project.
customer_reviews.author: Strokeofgenuis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool. I just installed life proof flooring and bought this to cut under door frames. A job that use to be a pain was made simple. My wife loved the sander attachment for her wood crafting project
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item
customer_reviews.text: Had previously purchased one for a friend who does a great deal of handyman work and it is his favorite tool, he even bought one like it for his son. When I had to borrow his for a job I bought my own!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: It is built like a tank and has all the options for around ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about the quality and marksman ship of this product. It is built like a tank and has all the options for around the home needs. Easy to put on and take off the blades & options. Got it for a good price on the lightning deal.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: I finally bought my own!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love it! I kept borrowing my friends Dremel set so when I started up some work on the bathroom I went ahead and sprung for my own! Thank God I did.. I love having this around! The kit that came with it seems thin but it did work.. so I won't be buying anything else for a while. So far I've used it to remove tile.. cut off the plastic splash shield under my car that got caught on something and tore up.... made a few small repairs around the house and I have it ready for the next problem that comes up! Everyone should have one! They're a life saver for sheet rock work too!
customer_reviews.author: Higrpwd

customer_reviews.title: a bit to loud and not enough power but does the job
customer_reviews.text: used this for small jobs around the house as an extra multi tool. not my favorite but for the price and parts that it comes with it, will use it for a year or two until it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Luar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome multi-tool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome multi-tool. This is my go-to tool for most of my fine cutting jobs. It is SOOOOOOOOOO much better than most. No more fiddling around with the blade retaining nut coming loose in the middle of the cut. Changing blades is a snap and once it's attached, it stays put until you push the lever to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Real time saver
customer_reviews.text: Delivers a clean cut. Can get into tight places. I cut out a base cabinet that my contractor just installed right over an outlet. 10 minutes maybe with this tool. I can’t imagine how I could have fixed this with a coping saw or anything else in my tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Terry R.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Since I have other P-C tools and have been happy with their performance, decided that I would buy this multi tool for a couple of home improvement projects. So far so good. It has done all I've asked of it. Yeah, as others have said, it gets warm - but it is a hard working tool and to date, not been a problem. If, after a few more uses it doesn't perform well, I'll update this review
customer_reviews.author: JD W

customer_reviews.title: Corded works best to avoid frustration of depleted battery in the middle of a project!
customer_reviews.text: Tool worked great for hardwood floor repairs. Was able to precisely cut out damaged flooring and use scraping tool to easily remove old glue from concrete floor. Tool seems well built for heavy use but it gets very warm to hold on to after heavy use. Must wear gloves during heavy use. Quick release feature works great for quick change out of different cutting tools and scrapers without need of other wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. C.

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: did our own flooring with it. could not have finished the floor without it. Although I had a light on my hat, I would have liked to have a built in light next time I buy this type of tool
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great tool but sanding pad melts like butter.
customer_reviews.text: Good value and solid build. I have overall had fairly good experiences with Porter Cable products. Loses a star because the sanding pad is utterly useless. Velcro part melts in seconds. No idea why they don;t use an industrial grade velcro. Common problem and seems like an easy fix. No idea why they spend all of this time creating a product like this and have such a useless accessory included. Everything else is aok,
customer_reviews.author: Niven

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying more for a higher quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tool it has seen extensive use and the ability to change motor speed on the go is great. The blade changing system is easy and significantly faster than other makes of this tool. Other oscillating tools I've used have a much slower blade changing method and is harder to change the blade and get it situated correctly. The blades that this came with are not a good as the most blades you can buy separately, but they are very serviceable. When I bought this the blades included were worth more than what I payed for the kit if I were buying similar blades.
customer_reviews.author: BHunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for 1/2 price during the holidays in '16 and it was a great value. In addition to the nice storage box, it also came with a wide range of blades and accessories. This replaced a cheap store brand unit and works tons better. Great tool and value!
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent buy. The tool is exceptional but what really ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent buy. The tool is exceptional but what really makes it a great buy are all of the accessory that were included. These are very expensive when purchased separately. Before buying this tool I bought one from Harbor Freight for $15. It works well but is not in the same league as this tool. The Porter Cable has a lot more power, runs more smoothly and I especially like the quick change mechanism for the blades. When you account for all of the accessories that were included with the tool the total cost was actually cheaper than buying the one from Harbor Freight.
customer_reviews.author: pmajor

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure how useful this tool would be but it works really well ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how useful this tool would be but it works really well for many tasks other tools can't. The quality is very good, as you would expect from Porter Cable. The more you use the tool the more ideas you come up with on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy G

customer_reviews.title: and it's come to be one of my favorite go-to tools
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tool for 3 years now; when I bought it, I questioned whether I really needed it, and it's come to be one of my favorite go-to tools. After 3 years, it does feel like the oscillating head may be starting to bind up some and notice it getting hotter than before, so it's probably due for a teardown and cleaning; but otherwise it has been dependable. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David Sink

customer_reviews.title: Here's the Buzz
customer_reviews.text: I held out too long to get this home power tool. For light duty home use it has worked well. Used this to put together more stable interlocked pine shelves for the garage; undercut molding when installing new wood flooring; cut acrylic plastic "glass" that would normally burn and smell with most other saws. This compliments using a dremel-type tool for cutting. I try to not only wear safety glasses with this tool but also ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: DHH

customer_reviews.title: Great multi tool at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am very handy and do a lot of projects. I always wanted a FEIN multi tool, but hesitated because of the price. I bought this Porter Cable multi tool kit because it was a good price and it had favorable reviews. It is a great tool. It is very handy and I can do things that my ordinary power tools could not do. It seems to be very durable and easy to hold and use. It has enough power. The accessories can be changed easily. This kit also has a full range of accessories so that you can do many things.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Very multi-functional tool!
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the Universal Fit system on this unit. I know some reviews have said it's slightly difficult to put attachments but I believe that's because it needs to be snug in order to hold the attachments securely. I actually didn't find that much trouble switching out attachments. In regard to other reviews saying the casing heats up, I believe people are forceful with it as it's just the same thing as rotary tool, you lightly apply it to the surface of whatever you're working on. I personally recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: DJ MinWah

customer_reviews.title: Best tool in the tool house
customer_reviews.text: I must say, this thing is plenty powerful... I have not used it myself, but both my granite guy and my bathroom remodeling guy have used it and they raved about it. They liked it so much, they went on Amazon and purchased one. I figured I needed one in my tool house, so glad I bought it...
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: This one is well worth taking good long look at.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, very easy to change a blade out and lock another in place (Rock Solid) in seconds. Over the years I have used models from many companies some costing as much as four times the price and that unites blades would vibrate loose time after time. Other models that I have used when put under the same conditions and workload could not maintain a set vibration speed they would overheat quickly and require time to cool down, still others just burn up the thermal protection sencer and quite. I am very pleased to have this powerful and versatile addition in my tool lineup.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the porter cable tools  exceptional
customer_reviews.text: Love my porter cable that pill porter cable for a couple years and with the 52 accessories it makes my job around the house much easier
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: just a perfect tool for so many
customer_reviews.text: used for first time putting down a vinyl floor tiles are very expensive and mistakes would be costly. the tool is so precise I was able to return the extra box of tiles that would have normally be consumed with mis-cutes and errors. just a perfect tool for so many cuts
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dyer

customer_reviews.title: ... have used this quite a bit now a still love it. If I did it all over again
customer_reviews.text: I have used this quite a bit now a still love it. If I did it all over again, I probably would have gone with the RIGID from Home Depot because you can get different heads it you want and when it is on sale, it can be cheaper. Other than that, I have removed tile grout, kerfed door jams and casing, trimmed laminate flooring, etc. and all jobs came out great and went smoothly. This thing has a powerful motor in it and you don't have to worry about a battery dying.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The perfect power tool for precision work!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is GREAT! I bought it at a great price on black friday last fall since I knew i'd need something to trim my door trim when I installed new flooring in my house. Well, yesterday I prepped my trim, and it was so easy it was almost a non-event! I'm amazed at the power and precision offered by this tool!
customer_reviews.author: tony scott

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have an oscillating tool, this is a good choice
customer_reviews.text: with the right blades, this can cut anything. this comes with a good assortment of blades. it sands better than my sander. good case to have. only regret i have is not getting the wireless one. otherwise, solid choice
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Too much side vibration
customer_reviews.text: This porter cable multitool has plenty of power, good size, excellent blade release and fastening mechanism but I didn't like the single speed all out power as soon as you start it..... It created too much sideways vibration without the ability to control the speed. The tool is well put together and the hard case makes very easy to organize in the garage vs canvas bags that are provided with other brands. When Porter Cable improves this feature it would easily earn 5 stars in my book.
customer_reviews.author: JEBB

customer_reviews.title: It may not be an everyday tool but when you have a job that fits it is a joy to work with
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a goldbox sale for $75 and it has just been sitting waiting for a job until this weekend. I had to cut out some wood rot on two door frames and the piece was 1 1/4 deep. What would have taken a maddening long time with a chisel and hammer was done in a minute with this. It may not be an everyday tool but when you have a job that fits it is a joy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Bayshore

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable Multi-Took Kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool kit on sale for a very good price, about 30 dollars less than at the big box stores and with more accessories. It's the first oscillating tool I've used and it has come in handy. It's not the first tool I reach for but it has its applications. The only problem I've found is that the adjustable guide vibrates off. A little lock-tite will probably take care of that minor issue. Overall it's a good tool with a good solid feel. Very well built as you would expect from Porter Cable.
customer_reviews.author: fs15

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy for Most Women
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to using this tool and if I were a strong man with wrists of steel, it would have been fine. One reviewer said they thought the device weighed about 2 pounds. It actually weighed about 4.5 pounds which is way too heavy for me. It looked like a fine tool with lots of great attachments, but the weight was something I couldn't overcome.
customer_reviews.author: glasslady

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fair amount of goodies are included with the tool. I have had and used other oscillating tools and found this one does not transmit as much vibration to your body as others have. Anyone who has used one of these type of tools knows what I mean. I strongly recommend this one if this is your first oscillating tool. In all leave it to Porter Cable to come up with a nice unit at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Dealer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for around the home
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product for the price of $75.00. It does heat up quickly. If you were going to use it on a job all day long I would not recommend but I am using it for around my home which it is fine. We will see how well it cuts grout. It takes a bit getting use to with cutting tools. Take your time and use speed control. The blade is a inch or so wide. There are plenty of deals on line for cutting tools on line.

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend. I bought a house and this kit a ...
customer_reviews.text: You should have this kind of tools at home. It can deal with most work and effective. Strongly recommend. I bought a house and this kit a big helper for me.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent equipment. I had an HF version...it did not last very long. I liked the concept, so I bought a real tool. The kit is well equipped and the accessories are worth the price by themselves...and Porter-Cable is a great name in tools. What is especially worthwhile is the "tool-less" ability to change blades and sander accessories. Other tools require an allen wrench or screwdriver (like my previous HF). This is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: GregG

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Huge upgrade from my old Rockwell, love the easy to change blades. Great deal for this whole kit!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Little

customer_reviews.title: Easy blade Changes
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Easy blade Changes, but the blades that come with are total crap. Quick and simple to use and the edge guide thingy is a useful feature. The variable speed is very handy, but not used that often, honestly. I wish the oscillation was a bit wider for a more aggressive cut. But, hey, this isn't a circular saw. It's a tool for close in and fine detail work. Overall, the oscillation range is only a very minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan and Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super Tool !
customer_reviews.text: Super tool ! Bought it just because it was on special... and thinking it might come in handy some time. Then I suddenly I needed a tool that only this tool could satisfy. I did some precision wood cutting. Great tool ! It does get a little hot on towards the front of it, but just have to hold it at appropriate grip place.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: I can't compare this model to other oscillating tools from other manufacturers, but I've used it so many times since I got it. Really quite handy. Feels like it has plenty of power, and that the only thing holding it back from being stronger or faster is just the blades getting hot. Not a defect, but just physics. I've not used it for sanding, but for sawing, it is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Newman

customer_reviews.title: Much better than their battery powered version
customer_reviews.text: Good power, excellent assortment of attachments, tool less attachment change is the best on the market. Uses other brand attachments as long as they have open end to slide on. Battery powered (Li-Ion) model is very problematic with batteries that shake loose and die (not just run down, but die so that they will not recharge) quickly. Like all oscillating tools, it is loud, but definitely not the loudest I've used. Depth gauge is excellent and functional inclusion. .
customer_reviews.author: LFE3

customer_reviews.title: You'll use this more than you think
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a Lightning Deal as a gift for my brother. Since then, I've probably used it just as much or more than he has. It's just a real handy tool. When you have to cut or trim something in one of those tight spaces it's a real help. I've trimmed door jams, cut new holes for outlets, etc... the replacement blades are a little spendy, but they seem to last awhile, and I've abused them plenty. If I didn't already have easy access to one, I would definitly buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a very good product, especially for DIYs
customer_reviews.text: This product is made more for sawing, cutting, and scraping. For the price it is a very good product, especially for DIYs. I would have given it five starts, but the velcro on the edge of the sander pad easily melted. Fortunately, the sander pad can be replaced, but that is extra costs.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Arango

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutting Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for cutting wood trim or a hole for an outlet in drywall. Even alright for cutting thin metal. Comes with a great selection of blades and sanding pads. Easy to use/low learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: The Technological Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Must have tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool works great good for everything. Cleaned out grout lines came with the blades.If you do work around the house you need to own this.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor man

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Husband had priced this at local lumber yard and price was comparible but this one came with all the extras and the one at the lumber yard did not! Saw worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Man Handler
customer_reviews.text: This multi-tool requires someone with a strong grip to change the attachments. The power of the motor is excellent. The sanding pad and the sand paper hook and loop are just mediocre. The pad tears up easily and the felt on the sandpaper tends to stick to the pad that when you try to change the paper the pad itself starts coming apart. So as a vibrating saw the machine is 5 star. As a sander it is a 3 star. I have not tried the scraper but it should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this saw over others because of all the accessories that are provided. Also the reviews were very good. After using the tool for awhile I find that it was well worth the money it cost.
customer_reviews.author: rdehli

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one of these for a long time and am glad I waited for this one. The quick change feature makes it really easy to change blades or blade angles. It takes longer to find the blade I want to try than to change it. The variable speed makes it cut better depending on what material you are working with. I'm sure I will find many uses for it now that I have one to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Johnm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to our tool chest. Worked like a charm for undercutting for placement of flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Do your research and be rewarded.
customer_reviews.text: I did a great deal of research before I purchased the Porter-cable osscillating tool. It performed as advertised. The variable speeds makes it a real multi tool. You can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior 76

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought to strip sound deadener and insulation out of a car interior. Worked flawlessly with hours of run time. Fairly decent vibration dampenening for short term use. Hours of run time will make your hands go numb.
customer_reviews.author: brian davis

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tools I purchased in some time. This is a must if you do any drywall work. Alot of uses that I haven't even attempted yet. I bought this at a great price and the shipping was fast. The product is heavy duty and easy to use. It comes as a kit with everything you need. I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for such a tool.
customer_reviews.author: Dlbinne

customer_reviews.title: outstanding tool
customer_reviews.text: The oscillating tool by porter cable is the perfecct item for clean true cuts in drywall, wood trim where you want a finished look without fuss or bother. I even used it on a low setting in order to cut a new diffuser for a 4 foot fixture that would not fit otherwise. Most of these have a 2.5 amp motor, the 3 amp on this tool is better and its quick toolless blade change also puts it above some others. You will like this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Barbara Joe

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of hard work to an easier level.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband January of 2018. He absolutely loves this and it has helped with many shorter steps to an end👎
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool! I had this type of tool before and you changed the blades with a bolt and a set screw. The tightening and loosening of the bolt eventually caused the head to fall off and you couldn't find a replacement. This one has a sp ring lever that is so much more functional. The case and all the extra blades make this a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cosby

customer_reviews.title: What a nice kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that I could keep in the back seat of my truck so when I needed to cut something, or remove rotten wood for a small job, I had it with me, this fits the bill. I had a cheap one from Harbor Freight, but the pieces were always missing, or it did not come apart to change accessories, or it just would not work. This little kit had Harbor Freight costs, with a perfect, easy stored, nice running piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: Windows21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My newest favorite tool. I have had it for a few months now, and I bet I’ve used it 100 times. Love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Scovotti

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He loves it! Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Olivas

customer_reviews.title: This is quickly becoming my favorite go to tool
customer_reviews.text: This is quickly becoming my favorite go to tool. I have used it on a couple of projects now and it has preformed very well. Seems to be well built. A good choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-Tool
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using the Porter-Cable multi-tool. I used it to cut out some dry-wall ceiling from my garage and it worked great. It felt powerful enough to do the job, yet not too powerful that it didn't let me stay in control of the area that I wanted to cut away. All the accessories that came with were a huge bonus. Taking off the different blades and adding the other ones on was very easy. I felt like they might have came off with the vibration, but that was not an issue. The blades can get hot after some use, but that would be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F Campodonico

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Oscillating Tool for the sale price
customer_reviews.text: I saw several mediocre reviews but that is not true. I had one from Harbor Freight that was excellent for the price but when I saw this set with case and all the attachments, I gave my old one to a friend and he was excited to get that too. I would highly recommend this. The best feature is the quick disconnect for the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Bonito

customer_reviews.title: Oscillating tools are great.. I happen to have 2 now 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Oscillating tools are great..I happen to have 2 now 3 with this purchase. This one is a great fully functioning and durable tool what more can i say? I recommend people do their homework and study the purpose of each attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have used this tool for several demo projects and have been completely satisfied with its performance of the cutters and sander. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie J

customer_reviews.title: Truly useful
customer_reviews.text: I was roped into completing a kitchen renovation at my home which we've lived in for 4 months by my wife and was in desperate need of restaining all of the cabinetry in my kitchen. This tool came in very handy (sanding) and made the work much easier than how I've done it in the past the tool is very easy to use and has so many different features no matter what your project is you can really come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: REN

customer_reviews.title: good useful tool
customer_reviews.text: great tool....used it on a few projects already.Grout removal, and sanding cabinets. my only complaint is that its a bit heavy and gets hot so you have to be careful if you grab the front end...you could wear work gloves to solve that problem. it comes with allot of attachments and several grit sand paper choices.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: This tool is Great! I bit noisy but really does a good ...
customer_reviews.text: This tool is Great! I bit noisy but really does a good job. I purchased this tool for my bathroom remodeling job. The tool saved me time and effort, cutting through the drywall and tiles with ease. I've very satisfy with construction of this tool. It is made to take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Arias

customer_reviews.title: I used this product to install a vent for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to install a vent for my microwave range hood. I cut through 2x6's in tight spaces, used it to expertly cut through my cedar siding, and chew through plaster. My only gripe about the tool is that it gets HOT! I presume to boost the tools amperage rating they are wasting a lot of electricity on excess heat (not uncommon in the blender industry). The tool case and tools are a wonderfull addition. The tool itslef is worth what I paid for it. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great multitool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent multitool so far! Used for multiple precise, quick cutting uses! Seems to be great quality, and included assortment of blades, sanding accessories, etc.
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: Have not been able to find the attachment I would like.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty unit. Have not been able to find the attachment I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - easy to use tool.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my vinyl flooring project and the need to undercut the door jams. Tucks away in my tool cabinet very nice.
customer_reviews.author: detconnection

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I got this tool on a deal of the day offer It has been great for my little remodeling jobs here and there At such low price it does the job as good ads expensive tolls does,the reason I did not give it 5 stars because it kind gets very hot in your hand after using it for a while,other then that it's a great tool for little jobs around the house
customer_reviews.author: Mo burg

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Quality product. I just finished installing wood floors in my home and this did a perfect job cutting door jambs and casing. It paid for itself on the first one job.
customer_reviews.author: JaG

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Sander
customer_reviews.text: This will pretty much sand all the weird profiles and areas a normal sander can't do on the moldings, frames, etc..
customer_reviews.author: 1BarginHunter

customer_reviews.title: I like the easy blade switching feature and it works great ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the much cheaper house brand from Harbor Freight. I like the easy blade switching feature and it works great as expected. My only complaint is that it heats up quite a bit after about 5 minutes of use. Not sure if that is normal or just a problem with mine. Don't remember my other cheapy one doing that.
customer_reviews.author: PackerBacker75

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's small for what it is and yet has plenty of power. I've used it a number of times and I'm sure it will be one of those tools I keep on the shelf because I use it so often. The oscillating saw blades are a time saver and work really well. Nice Product!
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

product_meta.title: PORTER-CABLE Oscillating Tool Kit, 3-Amp, 52 Pieces (PCE605K52)
feature_bullets: 3-amp motor delivers power to complete applications fast
Tool-free system blade change allows quick changes and adjustments for specific applications without wrenches and bolts
Depth and cutting guide helps complete plunge and cutting tasks faster and with more control
10-foot cord minimizes the need for extension cords
Includes 52 accessories to provide all the essential components for your various projects

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,088 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
